Model: Mi Redmi Go (Blue, 16 GB) (1 GB RAM)
comment: Bought the phone today but the phone already had a dial number, that too on the date of November 12, which has been talked for 4 to 5 minutes. Is this phone new?

Model: Mi Redmi Go (Blue, 16 GB) (1 GB RAM)
comment: This phone is perfect for our parents, or who does not use his/her phone much, & looking for a lightweight compact size phone. Performance is decent, back camera is quite good, front is just ok, good battery life, smooth experience with Android go. Go for it if your uses are minimal.

Model: Mi Redmi Go (Blue, 16 GB) (1 GB RAM)
comment: Its a nice product with this price.. I purchased this product for my wife. All features are excellent. Battery runs up to 24 hrs continually .  Picture quality is good. Altogether Redmi go is a Good Product with this price.

Model: Mi Redmi Go (Blue, 16 GB) (1 GB RAM)
comment: Give review after a week of using. Battery run out quickly, one big missing on this phone is No Gallery app to store the picture other than file manager folder. I don't recommend this to buy.

Model: Mi Redmi Go (Blue, 16 GB) (1 GB RAM)
comment: Product is a good one. Basically if your parents Or kids are using smart phones for the first time it's the best.I ordered it for my mother. She doesn't use any other app apart from WhatsApp. She finds it convenient to use. Battery life would have been better.
